roleset_name: change the detail with which an image is viewed, for the larger or the smaller; non-VPC

roles.descr: agent, entity making arg1 larger or smaller
roles.descr_trans: 代理，使 arg1 更大或更小的实体

roles.descr: thing zoomed in or out- screen, display, device
roles.descr_trans: 放大或缩小的事物 - 屏幕、显示器、设备

roles.descr: zoomed in on or from what- image enlarged or shrunk
roles.descr_trans: 放大或缩小图像 - 图像放大或缩小

roleset_name_trans: 更改查看图像的细节，放大或缩小；非VPC

roleset_name: look at a small section in larger detail

roles.descr_trans: 代理，使 arg1 变大的实体

roles.descr: thing zoomed in- screen, display, device
roles.descr_trans: 放大的东西——屏幕、显示器、设备

roles.descr: zoomed in on what- image enlarged

roleset_name_trans: 查看一小部分的更大细节

roleset_name: look at a larger section with less detail

roles.descr_trans: 代理，使 arg1 变大的实体

roles.descr: thing zoomed in- screen, dispaly, device
roles.descr_trans: 事物放大 - 屏幕、显示、设备

roles.descr: zoomed out from what- image shrunk

roleset_name_trans: 查看较少细节的较大部分
